snippet: With just eight days until the vote on June 25, Gabriel Gomez trails Edward J. Markey in the polls by an average of nine percentage points and has raised only about one-third the money Mr. Markey has raised.
abstract: With just eight days until the vote on June 25, Gabriel Gomez trails Edward J. Markey in the polls by an average of nine percentage points and has raised only about one-third the money Mr. Markey has raised.

headline.main: In Massachusetts Senate Race, Odds for G.O.P. Upset Are Slim
